dcterms:creator: Louis Kim
Rebecca Russell
dcterms:description: Draper is a large and highly imbalanced dataset with over a million C/C++ functions collected from open source repositories on Github, and the Debian Linux distribution. Each function was checked by three static analyzers and labeled by security experts.
dcterms:title: Draper

dcterms:creator: Yaqin Zhou
Shangqing Liu
Jingkai Siow
Xiaoning Du
Yang Liu
dcterms:description: QEMU+FFmpeg is a smaller but balanced dataset collected from Github repositories. The labeling is done based on commit messages and domain experts.
dcterms:title: QEMU+FFmpeg
